EmailTemplate.description: Notification to the SA coordinator to RTS partial wine consignment
EmailTemplate.name: SSSW SA Wine Network Notification Partial RTS
EmailTemplate.subject: eParcel Damage Instructions - RTS for partial damaged article: {!Case.ReferenceID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Wine Customer has requested RTS of a partial article via Netley PDC Case {!Case.CaseNumber} has been created for {!Contact.LastName}.
Reference ID: {!Case.ReferenceID__c} Please click this link to view the Case: {!Case.Link}
Thank you for reporting the damaged parcel {!Case.ReferenceID__c} to the eParcel Damages Team. The sender has requested that only the damaged article be delivered to the address detailed below.
INSTRUCTIONS
1. If this is a multi consignment please deliver all remaining undamaged boxes to the addressee.
2. Please attach the yellow 'Damaged article - not for delivery' stickers to the damaged article and record the reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}.
3. Ensure that the appropriate Damaged and Deliver event scans are recorded in EM prior to dispatch.
4. Repack the damaged carton (ensure addressee labels are included), print this Case.
5. Fold where indicated below and affix address label to return parcel.
Regards,
Australia Post Customer Contact Centre
FOR YOUR CONVENIENCE FOLD OR CUT HERE AND TAPE TO DAMAGED CARTON
SA WINE Co-ordinator Netley Parcel Delivery Centre Attn: David Marshall 368 Richmond Road NETLEY SA 5037
{!Case.EmailThreadID__c}
